about_page_about_section_desc1:
Different solutions for storing data are very usable among researchers.
 When it comes to biological databases, it usually involves a complete set of software solutions for storing, collecting, adding data, along with data curation and presentation.
about_page_about_section_desc2:
Today, there are thousands of known biological databases.
 However, there are not many biological databases approaching aging among them.
 Therefore, we are developing a database of human genes associated with aging.
about_page_about_section_title:
Open Genes¬† is a¬†biological database of human genes,

about_page_curated_section_subtitle: Biologists manually collect information about the gene evolution, its¬†functions, and methods for determining the gene's association with aging and longevity.
about_page_donation_text:
Make a donation and support the project.
 Even small amount matters.
about_page_features_1_desc:
We have collected data on¬†human genes associated with¬†aging and on which processes
 their products are involved.
about_page_features_2_desc: Compare genes by function, expression, evolutionary age, see correlations with other genes.
about_page_features_3_desc: Work with¬†all collected data using the web interface and API. Use it in your apps.
about_page_participation_text:
Join Open Genes developers team 
on¬†GitHub. We have many different tasks for you.

about_page_subtitle:
We give researchers in the¬†field of aging genetics and¬†related
 processes an ability to build hypotheses using proven data,
 and¬†provide the necessary tools.

about_page_why_section_4: The most complete data on¬†the evolutionary history of¬†the¬†gene
about_page_why_section_5: A list of¬†all genes and their main characteristics put together
about_page_why_section_6: Ability to¬†group and compare genes according to¬†various criteria and their combinations
